Description:
[b] I spend hundreds of hours making maps for you guys without any benefits. I created a patreon so you can help me getting money out of it. If you like this map please consider a donation. [/b] 
https://www.patreon.com/gidek
(1000$ goal reach = start of Hide and Seek #2 development)

Join my discord if you have questions, recommandations, or need help setting up multiplayer workshop maps, im there to help you : https://discord.gg/UPVzqBP

~~~
Hi,

[i]How much time can you keep the ball in the air?[/i]


Just a simple map while i'm working on a way bigger singleplayer map, coming sometime in 2019.


- Ball goes up when its fully formed
- Death zones are next to every walls
- Both the ball and car trigger the deathzones


[b]This map is not meant to reproduce a "real" air dribble, just have fun :)[/b]


Do your best score and challenge your friends!
My own record is 13.46s.


[i]If you want to help me creating more maps, money is really appreciated^^[/i] 
https://www.paypal.me/gidek

(donators will get access to the beta of my next map when its release, sometime in 2019 :p)
